entrance room.name: entrance room
entrance room.description: You're in the entrance room, of a haunted cabin.

exits.description: A door leads into the hall.

hallway.name: hallway
hallway.description: This is a hallway with many locked doors.

exits.description: Go back into the entrance hall.
There is a staircase leading upward.
Nevermind; go back to the hallway.
A door at the bottom of the stairs has a red, glowing, EXIT sign.
A door at the bottom of the stairs has a red, glowing, EXIT sign.

outside.name: outside
outside.description: You've escaped! You ski down the hill for miles.
